attributes.action: Ignore the petition calling for President Trump to be denied a State visit to UK
attributes.additional_details: It's time the loud, crass voices of those who despise both the United Kingdom and the United States were drowned out by those of ordinary, decent tax payers.
attributes.background: Having seen the petition being touted by the Labour party and MSM, supported by the terminally offended, I think it's important that the rest of the world understands that the majority of Britons are looking forward to President Trump's visit to the UK.
